enum AkMoveMethod

Move method for position change.

See also:
  • AK::IAkStdStream::SetPosition()
  • AK::IAkAutoStream::SetPosition()
Enumerator:
AK_MoveBegin 

Move offset from the start of the stream.

AK_MoveCurrent 

Move offset from the current stream position.

AK_MoveEnd 

Move offset from the end of the stream.
